function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative impact on economies due to travel restrictions","Impact":"Destroyed economies, unemployment, reduced industrial production","Mitigation":"Economic support, development of alternative industries","Technologies":"Digital platforms for remote work, e-commerce solutions","People":"Workers, business owners, employees","Owner":"Government, business owners, economic policymakers"},{"Description":"Reduction in air pollution and carbon emissions","Impact":"Positive impact on air quality, reduction in climate change effects","Mitigation":"Investment in sustainable energy, promotion of electric vehicles","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, electric vehicle infrastructure","People":"Urban societies, individuals affected by air pollution","Owner":"Environmental agencies, urban planners, government"},{"Description":"Decrease in public transit use and emphasis on cycling and walking","Impact":"Reduced use of public transit, increased emphasis on active transportation","Mitigation":"Development of cycling infrastructure, pedestrian-friendly urban planning","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, urban design software","People":"Commuters, pedestrians, cyclists","Owner":"Urban planners, city officials, transportation authorities"}]}
